org.smartfrog.sfcore.logging
Interface LogAttributes

public interface LogAttributes

A simple interface to modify logging attributes for all subset of loggers when possible.

Method Summary
 boolean setAttribute(java.lang.Object name, java.lang.Object value)
           To change a property in all registered loggers
